entities.name: portkey
entities.description: A magical object used to travel between locations. It is mentioned that Harry will use a Portkey to get to the Burrow.

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The home of the Weasley family, located in the countryside. It is mentioned as the destination for the Portkey.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a wizard who is on the run from Death Eaters. He is mentioned as one of the seven Harry Potters flying through the skies tonight.

entities.name: tonks's parents
entities.description: The home of Tonks's parents, which is one of the safe houses that the group will be heading to. It is mentioned as a possible destination for the group.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who are enemies of Harry Potter. They are mentioned as being after Harry.

relationships.description: Harry will use a Portkey to get to the Burrow, which is his destination.
Harry will use a Portkey to travel to the Burrow.
Death Eaters are after Harry, making him their target.
Tonks's parents' home is one of the safe houses that the group will be heading to.
Harry is related to Tonks, whose parents live in a safe house.
